title: Am i Banned?

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: my account's password doesn't work anymore for whatever reason.

replies.body: You need to open a PSS ticket. Your account was locked to protect from compromise.

Hey riot tantram. Just curious because ive been looking at some of your replies to others. Just wanted your opinion on something. Youve said earlier and i quote "People don't get banned for curse words or vulgar language. Shit, shit, fuck." and in the riot summoners code it states under section 4 Titled 'Enjoy Yourself, but not at Anyone Else's Expense', "Remember, taking a jab at your friend in the middle of the game is a lot different than making a gib remark at a complete stranger."

I'd like you to look at my case, because this account was permabanned over two of my last games. In which i was using vulgar language with my brother in game. Tribunal obviously did not consider that. Meaning i was wrongfully banned.

this is what i get and thanks for your help

https://gyazo.com/2f57658cdc4ccf78f0bbf2b33b94ae6f

this is what i get when i try to reset password

https://gyazo.com/2f57658cdc4ccf78f0bbf2b33b94ae6f
